video.title: 30 Days
video.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock hosts this reality series that attempts to up participants' empathy quotients by immersing them in someone else's reality for a month.

episodes.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock and his fiancée leave their fabulous New York lifestyles and work at multiple minimum-wage jobs for 30 days earning $5.15 per hour.
episodes.title: Minimum Wage

episodes.synopsis: A 30-something former athlete battles back at his expanding waistline by going on an anti-aging drug regime prescribed by a doctor for 30 days.
episodes.title: Anti-Aging

episodes.synopsis: David Stacy, a 33-year-old Christian man, agrees to make a drastic life change for 30 days when he moves to the Muslim community of Dearborn, Mich.
episodes.title: Muslims and America

episodes.synopsis: A conservative homophobe from red-state America travels to San Francisco's Castro District to live in one of the gayest areas of the country.
episodes.title: Straight Man in a Gay World

episodes.synopsis: Two 30-year-old professionals learn to live without the natural resources that will be depleted from our earth in the not-too-distant future.
episodes.title: Off the Grid

episodes.synopsis: A mother concerned about her daughter's alcohol consumption at college agrees to binge drink for 30 days to try to get through to her.
episodes.title: Binge Drinking Mom

episodes.synopsis: A man who opposes illegal immigration spends 30 days with a family of illegal immigrants.
episodes.title: Immigration

episodes.synopsis: An unemployed American ventures to India for 30 days to observe the effects of job outsourcing on the Indian culture.
episodes.title: Outsourcing

episodes.synopsis: A female atheist spends 30 days living with a fundamentalist Christian family.
episodes.title: Atheist/Christian

episodes.synopsis: Seeking relief from his hectic lifestyle, a man spends 30 days using New Age methods to improve his personal well-being.
episodes.title: New Age

episodes.synopsis: Six years after having an abortion, a pro-choice woman spends 30 days living with pregnant women in a pro-life housing unit.
episodes.title: Pro-Choice/Pro-Life

episodes.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock undertakes a challenge himself and attempts to spend 30 days locked up in a county jail.
episodes.title: Jail

episodes.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock spends 30 days working in a coal mine in Bolt, W. Va.
episodes.title: Working in a Coal Mine

episodes.synopsis: Retired NFL cornerback Ray Crockett attempts to spend 30 days confined to a wheelchair.
episodes.title: 30 Days in a wheelchair

episodes.synopsis: Avid hunter George Snedecker attempts to spend 30 days living with a vegan family in Los Angeles, while learning about animal rights programs.
episodes.title: Animal Rights

episodes.synopsis: Kati, a mother of two adopted children, attempts to spend 30 days living with domestic partners Dennis and Thomas Patrick and their four adopted sons.
episodes.title: Same Sex Parenting

episodes.synopsis: Gun-control advocate Pia Lalli attempts to spend 30 days living in Leesburg, Ohio, with gun enthusiasts Ken Ekermeyer and his son Zach.
episodes.title: Gun Nation

episodes.synopsis: Morgan Spurlock spends 30 days living on a New Mexico Native American reservation. There, he experiences the modern amenities available.
episodes.title: Life on an Indian Reservation
